Other CB Clients

"Hitting reload all the time is getting old! Is there a better way? What other clients can I use for the Chatterbox?"

Try one of these alternate programs/scripts/pages for the Chatterbox, categorized for your convenience:

  • No installation required, click and type.
    • [FullPage Chat] and [http://pthbb.org/cb/|Enhanced FullPage Chat] - web page w/ frames.
    • [id://725405] - lets you "detach" the [About the Chatterbox Nodelet|Chatterbox Nodelet].
    • [id://220674]. (The code is allegedly [http://sourceforge.net/projects/jchatter/|available at Sourceforge], if you would rather deal with a standalone app than embedded java applets.)
    • The [chatterbox sidebar] doesn't require manual installation, but on most modern browsers, you can bookmark it, edit the properties of the bookmark, and use it as a sidebar.
    • [im2] has a stream of the CB at desert-island.dynodns.net port 4040 - type telnet desert-island.dynodns.net 4040 at a command prompt if your browser doesn't support telnet:// style links

  • Cross platform GUI clients.
    • [id://19420]
    • [id://22273]
    • [id://61227]
    • [id://338783]
    • [id://383819]

  • Command line.
    • [id://82809]
    • [id://117372]
    • [id://85317]

  • Local web server required.
    • [id://95346] is the updated version of [id://63816] (source at [id://598676])

  • Windows only.
    • [id://18472]
    • [id://30694]

  • Interfaces for other protocols.
    • [id://118732]
    • [id://235499]
    • [id://15869] - Speech interface to chatterbox.
    • [id://71822]
    • [id://31805]
    • [id://132484]
    • [id://595893] and [id://600052]

  • Support scripts and info.
    • See the [id://72241|XML generators] if you want to roll your own client.
    • There are numerous scripts and modules listed in [id://26649]. Some are better and better-maintained than others. Perhaps the most well known is:
    • [http://sourceforge.net/projects/perlmonks-mods/|PerlMonks Modules] project on SourceForge

You may also be interested in ways to see [href:///?node_id=236794#history|recent chatterbox history].

This is still an incomplete list. If you know of others, /msg any [SiteDocClan] member to have it added.
